title: Vault opening snowdown 2016?
body: Hi! I was just wondering if the vault was going to open this showdown 2016, because i disenchanted blacksmith poppy, and just realized i regret it so bad. ;/.plz riot, open the vault, I'm begging...

replies.body: I honestly have no idea whether the vault will open or when it will open. I guess we'll both have to keep a steady eye on [the News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) to see if something gets announced. ^.^
Can we gift Mystery Icons, or is that feature not available this time?

I've never seen a *Gift Mystery Icon* option, so I don't think that's a thing right now, but **you can** purchase an icon for someone through the gifting center! :D

Edit: Needed to Clarify *gifting*

I would, but the icon that I want isn't available in the shop (I have been offered a summoner icon of choice) - and I read the fine print about mystery icons a little late. ;)

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/ocean-week-fizz-summoner-icon-store-now

EUNE never got a news page about that one back then. NA did. EUW did. Just not EUNE. Had I known it to be legacy - pretty much limited, considering all the new icons released since - I'd have spent those 250 RP at the time (was low on EUR; figured I'd have all the time in the world, as it wasn't listed as legacy, or even mentioned at all, anywhere).

And as the current mystery icon purchases only allows for icons _currently available in the shop_, it's a bust for me.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vlsFXpEe,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-27T00:00:38.083+0000)
>
> I've never seen a *Mystery Icon* option, so I don't think that's a thing right now, but **you can** purchase an icon for someone through the gifting center! :D

http://i.imgur.com/pQglmzO.png

huh? 0.o
...I mean it's in the shop *right now*.
Though I don't think it is for gifting. But like 90% sure it has been at some point.
I sure hope so. Also you disenchanted Blacksmith Poppy? WHY???? I'm Mastery level 7 with her and have been hunting for that skin in hex tech, would be an instant buy even though I have Star Guardian.
